description: PIMS 3423 FS: Overcoming Barriers to Sustainability of Costa Rica´s Protected Areas System.

subproject.description:
Outcomes:
-A national policy for a consolidated terrestrial and marine PA System is approved and in force.
-SINAC's institutional PA System framework and capacity is enhanced for eco-regional planning and optimal management effectiveness.
-SINAC has the financial sustainability to effectively attain its strategic objectives and provide resources for long-term PA system management needs.
-SINAC tests new and innovative conservation approaches at the conservation area 
-Successful PA system management models are scaled-up and replicated at the systemic level through strategic partnerships with key stakeholders.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS 3423 FS: CR´s Protected A
